original_text:
Book of Relics
Le prime slot machine ad essere immesse sul mercato come macchinette da sala giochi o da bar sono state le mitiche Fruit Machine, ossia i giochi in cui i simboli erano rappresentati da frutti, dal numero 7, dalla scritta BAR e dalla campanella. Con l’avvento delle slot machine online le software house piano piano hanno abbandonato le Fruit Machine e si sono sbizzarrite cercando di proporre giochi con tematiche sempre più originali, magari accompagnate da effetti speciali o dalle ultime tecnologie nell’ambito delle animazioni tridimensionali.
Le slot a tema antiche civiltà, e in particolare quelle ambientate all’ombra delle piramidi dell’Egitto, sono di certo le più popolari: ogni software house che si rispetti ne ha una nel proprio catalogo, e anche la Williams Interactive con la sua Book of Relics si inserisce a pieno titolo in questo filone.
Molte slot a tema antico Egitto si sviluppano intorno a immagini di antichi tempi, piramidi e ambientazioni desertiche, Book of Relics invece usa come sfondo una tomba abbandonata.
La grafica di questa slot riesce a rendere perfettamente il clima di oscurità e mistero e sebbene non sia niente di eccezionale, riteniamo che riesca a creare la giusta atmosfera per garantire un’esperienza di gioco coinvolgente.
Il protagonista di Book of Relics è la divinità Anubi, con le fattezze mezzo umane e mezzo canine, che compare sia nella schermata iniziale sia ai lati della griglia di gioco, immersa nelle profondità sabbiose dell’antica tomba.
Caratteristiche principali della slot
Book of Relics nasce da una collaborazione tra la Williams Interactive (WMS) e la Red 7, ed è disponibile sia da computer desktop, sia per dispositivi mobili Android, Windows e iOS.
Lo schema di gioco è quello tradizionale, con cinque rulli, tre righe, dieci linee di pagamenti fisse e vincite che si ottengono per allineamenti di simboli identici su rulli adiacenti andando da sinistra verso destra.
I pulsanti Plus e Minus, posti sotto la griglia di gioco, permettono di selezionare l’importo della scommessa, che va da un minimo di 10 centesimi fino a un massimo di 200 € a giro, soddisfacendo tutte le tipologie di giocatori.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP) dichiarato di Book of Relics oscilla tra il 94,36 e il 96,36%.
Simboli e funzionalità
I simboli con valore più basso sono i numeri e lettere che si riferiscono alle carte da gioco, riprodotti in stile egiziano, che in questo caso vanno dal 10 all’Asso.
Per ottenere delle vincite più consistenti si dovrà sperare che appaiano sui rulli i simboli tematici, tra i quali troviamo un pugnale, la divinità con la testa di uccello, la regina e il Faraone, che ha il valore più alto in assoluto, fino a 5.000 volte l’importo della puntata quando compare su tutti i cinque rulli.
Il Wild del gioco è il libro delle reliquie che dà il titolo alla slot e che oltre alla funzione di jolly ha anche quella di Scatter, permettendo di ottenere un numero variabile di giri gratuiti, in cui si può usufruire di alcuni moltiplicatori.
Ad aumentare le possibilità di vincita c’è anche la funzione dei simboli impilati, attiva anche questa quando si giocano i free spins.

raw_translation.response:
Book of Relics
The first slot machines to be introduced on the market as arcade or bar machines were the legendary Fruit Machines, where symbols were represented by fruits, the number 7, the BAR sign and the bell. With the advent of online slot machines, software providers gradually abandoned Fruit Machines and began to explore more and more original themes, accompanied by special effects or the latest technologies in the field of three-dimensional animations.

Ancient civilization-themed slots, especially those set in the shadow of the pyramids of Egypt, are certainly the most popular: every respected software provider has one in its catalogue, and even Williams Interactive with its Book of Relics is fully part of this trend. Many ancient Egypt-themed slots revolve around images of ancient times, pyramids and desert settings, but Book of Relics instead uses an abandoned tomb as its background.

The graphics of this slot perfectly convey the atmosphere of darkness and mystery, and although it doesn't offer anything exceptional, we believe it manages to create the right atmosphere to ensure an engaging gaming experience. The protagonist of Book of Relics is the deity Anubis, with his half-human, half-canine features, who appears both on the initial screen and on the sides of the game grid, immersed in the sandy depths of the ancient tomb.

Main features of the slot
Book of Relics is the result of a collaboration between Williams Interactive (WMS) and Red 7, and is available on both desktop computers and mobile devices running Android, Windows and iOS. The game layout is traditional, with five reels, three rows, ten fixed paylines and winnings obtained by aligning identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right.

The Plus and Minus buttons, placed under the game grid, allow you to select the amount of your bet, ranging from a minimum of 10 cents to a maximum of €200 per spin, catering to all types of players. The declared theoretical return to player (RTP) for Book of Relics ranges from 94.36% to 96.36%.

Symbols and features
The lowest value symbols are the numbers and letters that refer to playing cards, reproduced in Egyptian style, ranging from 10 to Ace in this case. To get more substantial winnings, you will have to hope that the thematic symbols appear on the reels, including a dagger, the deity with the bird head, the queen and the Pharaoh, which has the highest value, up to 5,000 times the bet amount when it appears on all five reels. The Wild of the game is the Book of Relics that gives the slot its title and, in addition to its function as a wild, it also acts as a scatter, allowing you to obtain a variable number of free spins, in which you can take advantage of some multipliers. The stacked symbols feature also increases the chances of winning, which is activated during free spins.

The graphics of this slot perfectly convey the atmosphere of darkness and mystery, and although it doesn't offer anything exceptional, we believe it manages to create the right atmosphere to ensure an engaging gaming experience. Main features of the slot
Book of Relics is the result of a collaboration between Williams Interactive (WMS) and Red 7, and is available on both desktop computers and mobile devices running Android, Windows and iOS. The game layout is traditional, with five reels, three rows, ten fixed paylines and winnings obtained by aligning identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right.

The Plus and Minus buttons, placed under the game grid, allow you to select the amount of your bet, ranging from a minimum of 10 cents to a maximum of €200 per spin, catering to all types of players. The declared theoretical return to player (RTP) for Book of Relics ranges from 94.36% to 96.36%.

The Wild of the game is the Book of Relics that gives the slot its title and, in addition to its function as a wild, it also acts as a scatter, allowing you to obtain a variable number of free spins, in which you can take advantage of some multipliers. The stacked symbols feature also increases the chances of winning, which is activated during free spins.

Main features of the slot

Book of Relics is the result of a collaboration between Williams Interactive (WMS) and Red 7, and is available for desktop computers as well as for Android, Windows and iOS devices.

The game  follows the traditional format, with five reels, three rows, ten fixed pay lines, and winnings obtained through alignments of identical symbols on adjacent reels, going from left to right.

The Plus and Minus buttons, located underneath the game grid, allow you to select the bet amount, which ranges from a minimum of 10 cents to a maximum of €200 per spin, catering to all types of players.

The game's Wild is the book of relics that gives the slot its name and, in addition to the function of being a joker, also acts as a Scatter, allowing you to win a variable number of free spins, during which you can take advantage of some multipliers.

The stacked symbols function increases the chances of winning and is also active during free spins.

message.content:
Book of Relics

The first slot machines to hit the market were the mythical Fruit Machines, with symbols represented by fruits, the number 7, the word BAR, and the bell. With the advent of online slots, software houses have gradually abandoned Fruit Machines and have instead sought to offer games with increasingly original themes, perhaps accompanied by special effects or the latest technologies in the field of 3D animations.

Ancient civilization-themed slots, particularly those set in the shadow of the pyramids of Egypt, are certainly the most popular: every self-respecting software house has one in its catalog, and Williams Interactive's Book of Relics fits perfectly into this trend.

Many ancient Egypt-themed slots revolve around images of ancient times, pyramids, and desert settings, but Book of Relics uses an abandoned tomb as its backdrop.

The graphics of this slot perfectly convey the atmosphere of darkness and mystery, and while nothing exceptional, we believe that it creates the right atmosphere to ensure an engaging gaming experience.

The protagonist of Book of Relics is the deity Anubis, with half-human and half-canine features, who appears both on the initial screen and on the sides of the game grid, immersed in the sandy depths of the ancient tomb.

Main features of the slot

Book of Relics is the result of a collaboration between Williams Interactive (WMS) and Red 7, and is available for desktop computers as well as for Android, Windows and iOS devices.

The game  follows the traditional format, with five reels, three rows, ten fixed pay lines, and winnings obtained through alignments of identical symbols on adjacent reels, going from left to right.

The Plus and Minus buttons, located underneath the game grid, allow you to select the bet amount, which ranges from a minimum of 10 cents to a maximum of €200 per spin, catering to all types of players.

The declared theoretical return to player (RTP) of Book of Relics ranges from 94.36% to 96.36%.

Symbols and functionalities

The symbols with the lowest value are the numbers and letters referring to playing cards, portrayed in an Egyptian style, which in this case range from 10 to Ace.

To obtain more significant winnings, you will need to hope that the thematic symbols appear on the reels, including a dagger, the deity with the bird head, the queen, and the Pharaoh, who has the highest value of all, up to 5,000 times the bet amount when it appears on all five reels.

The game's Wild is the book of relics that gives the slot its name and, in addition to the function of being a joker, also acts as a Scatter, allowing you to win a variable number of free spins, during which you can take advantage of some multipliers.

The stacked symbols function increases the chances of winning and is also active during free spins.

Below is a review for the slot game "Book of Relics".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Game Description
Features and Symbols
Gameplay Layout and Paylines
Betting Range
Return to Player Percentage

- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

The Plus and Minus buttons, placed under the game grid, allow you to select the amount of your bet, ranging from a minimum of 10 cents to a maximum of €200 per spin, catering to all types of players. The declared theoretical return to player (RTP) for Book of Relics ranges from 94.36% to 96.36%.

Symbols and features
The lowest value symbols are the numbers and letters that refer to playing cards, reproduced in Egyptian style, ranging from 10 to Ace in this case. To get more substantial winnings, you will have to hope that the thematic symbols appear on the reels, including a dagger, the deity with the bird head, the queen and the Pharaoh, which has the highest value, up to 5,000 times the bet amount when it appears on all five reels. The Wild of the game is the Book of Relics that gives the slot its title and, in addition to its function as a wild, it also acts as a scatter, allowing you to obtain a variable number of free spins, in which you can take advantage of some multipliers. The stacked symbols feature also increases the chances of winning, which is activated during free spins.

Review: Book of Relics
The first slot machines to be introduced on the market as arcade or bar machines were the legendary Fruit Machines, where symbols were represented by fruits, the number 7, the BAR sign and the bell. With the advent of online slot machines, software providers gradually abandoned Fruit Machines and began to explore more and more original themes, accompanied by special effects or the latest technologies in the field of three-dimensional animations.

Ancient civilization-themed slots, especially those set in the shadow of the pyramids of Egypt, are certainly the most popular: every respected software provider has one in its catalogue, and even Williams Interactive with its Book of Relics is fully part of this trend. Many ancient Egypt-themed slots revolve around images of ancient times, pyramids and desert settings, but Book of Relics instead uses an abandoned tomb as its background.

The graphics of this slot perfectly convey the atmosphere of darkness and mystery, and although it doesn't offer anything exceptional, we believe it manages to create the right atmosphere to ensure an engaging gaming experience. The protagonist of Book of Relics is the deity Anubis, with his half-human, half-canine features, who appears both on the initial screen and on the sides of the game grid, immersed in the sandy depths of the ancient tomb.

Main features of the slot
Book of Relics is the result of a collaboration between Williams Interactive (WMS) and Red 7, and is available on both desktop computers and mobile devices running Android, Windows and iOS. The game layout is traditional, with five reels, three rows, ten fixed paylines and winnings obtained by aligning identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right.

The Plus and Minus buttons, placed under the game grid, allow you to select the amount of your bet, ranging from a minimum of 10 cents to a maximum of €200 per spin, catering to all types of players. The declared theoretical return to player (RTP) for Book of Relics ranges from 94.36% to 96.36%.

Symbols and features
The lowest value symbols are the numbers and letters that refer to playing cards, reproduced in Egyptian style, ranging from 10 to Ace in this case. To get more substantial winnings, you will have to hope that the thematic symbols appear on the reels, including a dagger, the deity with the bird head, the queen and the Pharaoh, which has the highest value, up to 5,000 times the bet amount when it appears on all five reels. The Wild of the game is the Book of Relics that gives the slot its title and, in addition to its function as a wild, it also acts as a scatter, allowing you to obtain a variable number of free spins, in which you can take advantage of some multipliers. response.headline: Game Description
response.content:
Buckle up, folks! Book of Relics is one of the latest casino slot games developed by Williams Interactive (WMS) and Red 7 and it is ready to take you on an adventure of a lifetime. Get ready to discover the secrets of the mysterious tomb and meet Anubis, the ancient god of the dead!

Book of Relics is a five-reel, three-row slot game with ten fixed paylines. Unlike some of its competitors, the game is not overflowing with bonuses and complex features. It’s a straightforward slot game that offers players a chance to win big while enjoying a seamless gaming experience. The game is accessible on desktop computers and smartphones or tablets running iOS, Android, and Windows operating systems.

The game’s layout is reminiscent of classic slot machines, but the graphics and sound effects transition it to the present day. What’s interesting about this game is the main character, Anubis, who is a bit of an underdog in the realm of online slots. Elegant and mysterious, he fits perfectly into the game’s ancient Egyptian theme. Who knows, you might even come across some other famous Egyptian figures.

Overall, Book of Relics is a game that is worth trying. The graphics, background music, and sound effects immediately transport you to the mystical land of ancient tombs and artifacts. And who wouldn’t want to encounter a powerful god along the way? But don’t just take our word for it; go ahead and give it a try for yourself! Who knows, it might just become your new go-to slot game!

- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Game Overview

Book of Relics is an ancient Egypt-themed slot game developed by Williams Interactive and Red 7. The game has a traditional layout, with five reels, three rows, and ten fixed paylines. It can be played on desktop and mobile devices running on Android, Windows, and iOS.

Symbols and Layout

The symbols in the game are a mix of playing cards adapted to the Egyptian theme and thematic symbols such as a dagger, the deity with the bird head, the queen, and the Pharaoh, which has the highest value, offering up to 5,000 times the bet amount when it appears on all five reels. The game's graphics convey the atmosphere of darkness and mystery, creating an engaging gaming experience with the abandoned tomb as the background. The game's layout consists of five reels, three rows, and ten fixed paylines, ensuring winnings are obtained by aligning identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right.

Betting Range

The Plus and Minus buttons, placed under the game grid, allow players to select the amount of their bets, with a range from a minimum of 10 cents to a maximum of €200 per spin, catering to all kinds of players. The game's declared theoretical return to player (RTP) ranges from 94.36% to 96.36%.

Wild and Scatter Symbols

The game's Wild symbol is the Book of Relics, which gives the slot its title. Besides functioning as a wild, it also acts as a scatter symbol, allowing players to obtain a variable number of free spins, in which they can benefit from some multipliers. This feature increases the chances of winning, which is activated during free spins.

Bonus Features

Book of Relics offers players the opportunity to trigger various bonus features. The game's stacked symbols feature ensures more towering wins are achieved during the bonus round. The free spins feature activated when players land three or more Book of Relics symbols in one spin, giving them up to ten free spins, depending on the number of scatters landed. The feature can be reactivated if players land three or more scatters during the free spins round. Players can also gamble their winnings by choosing to play a 50/50 game with a correct guess of the card color doubling their winnings.

Review: Book of Relics
The first slot machines to be introduced on the market as arcade or bar machines were the legendary Fruit Machines, where symbols were represented by fruits, the number 7, the BAR sign and the bell. With the advent of online slot machines, software providers gradually abandoned Fruit Machines and began to explore more and more original themes, accompanied by special effects or the latest technologies in the field of three-dimensional animations.

Ancient civilization-themed slots, especially those set in the shadow of the pyramids of Egypt, are certainly the most popular: every respected software provider has one in its catalogue, and even Williams Interactive with its Book of Relics is fully part of this trend. Many ancient Egypt-themed slots revolve around images of ancient times, pyramids and desert settings, but Book of Relics instead uses an abandoned tomb as its background.

The graphics of this slot perfectly convey the atmosphere of darkness and mystery, and although it doesn't offer anything exceptional, we believe it manages to create the right atmosphere to ensure an engaging gaming experience. The protagonist of Book of Relics is the deity Anubis, with his half-human, half-canine features, who appears both on the initial screen and on the sides of the game grid, immersed in the sandy depths of the ancient tomb.

Main features of the slot
Book of Relics is the result of a collaboration between Williams Interactive (WMS) and Red 7, and is available on both desktop computers and mobile devices running Android, Windows and iOS. The game layout is traditional, with five reels, three rows, ten fixed paylines and winnings obtained by aligning identical symbols on adjacent reels from left to right.

The Plus and Minus buttons, placed under the game grid, allow you to select the amount of your bet, ranging from a minimum of 10 cents to a maximum of €200 per spin, catering to all types of players. The declared theoretical return to player (RTP) for Book of Relics ranges from 94.36% to 96.36%.

Symbols and features
The lowest value symbols are the numbers and letters that refer to playing cards, reproduced in Egyptian style, ranging from 10 to Ace in this case. To get more substantial winnings, you will have to hope that the thematic symbols appear on the reels, including a dagger, the deity with the bird head, the queen and the Pharaoh, which has the highest value, up to 5,000 times the bet amount when it appears on all five reels. The Wild of the game is the Book of Relics that gives the slot its title and, in addition to its function as a wild, it also acts as a scatter, allowing you to obtain a variable number of free spins, in which you can take advantage of some multipliers. The stacked symbols feature also increases the chances of winning, which is activated during free spins.
